attributes.action: stop the planned early release of 3500 convicted prisoners which is being reported by senior prison services sources.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is being reported that senior government officials - both elected and appointed - are consorting to actively deceive the population over the arrangements for the early release of up to 3500 convicted prisoners.  If it is true that the people we trust to look after us can abuse the system to manipulate and benefit the political stance of the party they belong to then the public ought to be allowed a view on anything they do.  If there is no truth in the matter then the Prime Minister can have no hesitation in issuing an order which stops such dishonourable activity it it's tracks?

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
